overview: Three shocking tales of horror that will get you beyond fear. From the mind of the filmmaker Domiziano Cristopharo (House of Flesh Mannequins, Bloody Sin of Horror, Poe: Poetry of Eerie) and Mickael Abbate (Festival Director of "Samain du cin√©ma fantastique"), Phantasmagoria is a Franco-Italian co production.
tagline: 3 shocking tales of horror that takes you beyond fear.
title: Phantasmagoria
